logic

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an Agent inside a multi-agent system.

    This class represents a player from one of either team. It also represents an Agent in a multi-agent system as we can represent a Team as a multi-agent system. This class has all the important information about a player like the name, team number or position in the field.

    Version:
    v0.1 03/13/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(java.lang.String name,
     int number,
     boolean team_A,
     java.net.Socket socket)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player.
        number - number of the player inside its team.
        team_A - true if the player plays for the team A.
        socket - the Socket that will be used to work with the client application that will manage this player. might be null if the client is disconnected.
